issue.title: [Python][JPype] Test is failed with JPype 0.7.5
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9129](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9129). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/runs/769433714#step:6:7995

```

>       if jpype.__version_info__ >= (0, 7):
E       TypeError: '>=' not supported between instances of 'list' and 'tuple'
```

comments.body:
